includedAssets.title: Herrenvolk

includedAssets.title: Home
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully are called upon when a baby is found buried alive. Clues lead the pair to a reclusive family.

includedAssets.title: Teliko
includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder learns about the Teliko, a creature from African folklore who must suck the pigmentation from a person's body in order to survive.

includedAssets.synopsis: A group of racist teens kill a Jewish man, but their victim, it seems, has returned from the dead and is looking to exact revenge.

includedAssets.title: Max

includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder develops an interesting theory after a strange old man warns two scientists not to flash-freeze a compound they are working on.

includedAssets.synopsis: Mulder and Scully attempt to protect their secret contact as the Syndicate closes in. Thrilling fourth season starring David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson.

includedIn.title: The X-Files
includedIn.synopsis: Sceptic FBI Agent Dana Scully is sent to work on 'The X-Files': investigations into suspected paranormal activity led by Agent Fox Mulder, while an unexplained force works to thwart the duo’s efforts.
